\({4(x + 2)(x + 3)}/{6(x + 2)} + {3(3x + 5)}/{6(x + 2)}\)
Add the two expressions, then simplify

problemsArray.question:
Add:
\({(4x + 11)}/{2} + {(x + 9)}/{3(x + 1)}\)
problemsArray.explanation:
Equalize the denominators
\({(4x + 11)}/{2} * {3(x + 1)}/{3(x + 1)} + {(x + 9)}/{3(x + 1)} * {2}/{2}\)
\({3(x + 1)(4x + 11)}/{6(x + 1)} + {2(x + 9)}/{6(x + 1)}\)
Add the two expressions, then simplify
